main event: A civilian observed a dull white object in the sky, estimating its speed at 20 mph with no visible exhaust, on February 23, 1954, in Washington, D.C.
interesting points: The object was round in shape and climbed higher,The observer assumed an association between sound and light from the object,The conclusion of the report suggested the object was likely a balloon, Other witnesses observed similar objects in the area, The report details the observations without precise information on the duration.
